root.title: ccc accept bonu bid wheat flour iraq
root.body: commod credit corpor ccc accept bid export bonu cover sale 25,000 tonn wheat flour iraq u.s. agricultur depart sai depart sai bonu award averag 116.84 dlr per tonn shipment period march 15 april 20 12,500 tonn april 1 mai 5 12,500 tonn bonu award make peavei compani will pai form commod ccc stock sai addit 175,000 tonn wheat flour still avail iraq export enhanc program init announc januari 7 1987 depart sai
